mean_cn: adj. 工业化前的，未工业化的
mean_en: relating to the time before the organized action of making of goods and services for sale
sentence: In the preindustrial era, it could take weeks to make a single item of clothing.
sentence_trans: 在工业化前，只做一件衣服都会花上数周。
word_etyma: pre前 ＋ industr=industry工业 ＋ ial属于...的 → preindustrial工业化前的；未工业化的
